name: Finding Love
description:
A short, randomly generated roguelike-action game similar to the likes of Enter the Gungeon and The Binding of Isaac.

Your goal is to escape the zombie-infested area you find yourself in by finding the ladder in each different floor to escape to a new area.

Controls: WASD to move, mouse to aim, and left click to fire.

Also there's a story about a stalker or something I dunno.

Made for the #BrackeysGameJam
